name: Almighty Corsy
description:
moonfy presents! 

Almighty Corsy is an infinite runner game for people who get bored of heroic games. 

YOU DON'T NEED TO PLAY HERO ANYMORE!

We all know that humankind is cruel and selfish. We torture every living thing including our kind. Even if it's sad, we need to accept ourselves. Almighty Corsy puts your finger on the problem. You can read the story of Almighty Corsy in game. 

POWER?

Most of people wants to have amazing powers. As one of those people, we decided to make that dream little bit more real. You can gain super powered characters in game. In fact, our true intention about running is gaining more Alien DNA. Alien DNA gives us possibility to have more superpowers. Can you unlock all characters?

Cross Platform Game

Almighty Corsy is available for Android, iOS and Windows. Thanks to Unity Technologies, we were able to produce our game for almost everyone - sorry other OS users!

Donation

Almighty Corsy is moonfy's first big step in game industry. Donations would be appreciated.

ENJOY NEW GAME! :)
